dev.rachamon.rachamonguilds.api.utils

Class ChatQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.rachamon.rachamonguilds.api.utils.ChatQuestion

  • public final class ChatQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility for polling players with arbitrary questions, and offering an arbitrary amount of answers with various actions attached.
    The questions may be sent to the player either in the form of a chat message ( pollChat(Player) ), a book view ( pollBook(Player) ), or a combination of the two in the form of a chat-based view button ( pollViewButton(Player, Text) ).

      • asText

        public org.spongepowered.api.text.Text asText()
        Get the question as an interactable Text object. Above it will be placed the QUESTION_DECORATION_TOP, and after it the QUESTION_DECORATION_BOT.
        Returns:
        the Text object.

      • register

        public void register()
        Registers this question. Required to ensure the player cannot answer the question multiple times.

      • pollChat

                     org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Poll a player with this question via chat message ( See: asText() ).
        Parameters:
        player - The player to be polled.

      • pollBook

        public void pollBook(@Nonnull
                     org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)

        Parameters:

      • pollViewButton

        public void pollViewButton(@Nonnull
                           org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                           @Nonnull
                           org.spongepowered.api.text.Text buttonText)
        Poll a player with an interactable Text object. Clicking it will result in a BookView appearing and the player having to respond to the question.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to be polled.
        buttonText - The display text of the button.
